name: 𝐇𝐞𝐫𝐨 𝐌𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐜
description: ʙᴏᴛ ᴛᴏ ᴘʟᴀʏ sᴏɴɢs ɪɴ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴛᴇʟᴇɢʀᴀᴍ's ɢʀᴏᴜᴘ ᴠᴏɪᴄᴇ ᴄʜᴀᴛ ᴘᴏᴡᴇʀᴇᴅ ʙʏ PʏTɢCᴀʟʟs.

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with your bot username from @BotFather but without using '@' symbol

OWNER_USERNAME.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: if you have group, then fill the group username here without @

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user IDs counted as admin everywhere (separated by space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).
